com.accela.aa.emse.dom

Class CalendarScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.BaseAAScript
      • com.accela.aa.emse.dom.CalendarScript
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.CalendarScriptService, com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.ScriptAble

    public class CalendarScript
extends com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.BaseAAScript
implements com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.CalendarScriptService
     
 Accela Automation
 File: CalendarScriptEJB.java
 
 Accela, Inc.
 Copyright (C): 2001-2014
 
 Description:
 Provides the "aa.calendar" object through which script writers can
 operate on an retrieve calendars.
 
 Notes:
 $Id: CalendarScript.java 273454 2014-06-13 08:35:57Z ..\victor.tan $
 
 Revision History:
 20Apr2002  Johnny Zhou, Initial Version
 11/19/2002 Owen Yang, modify the method getCalendar();
 04/02/2005, Kenry Zou  public Collection getCalendars(...): add parameter: isForCreateCalendar,
 to distinct pure calendar query from the query for next step of calendar creation, here isForCreateCalendar is false.
 07/31/2006 Winter Jiang Added methods for inspection scheduling EMSE
 08/22/2006 Witner Jiang Modified getEventSeriesByCalendarID method
 11/01/2006 Michael Mao cache service object.
